title: Bohème Life Duplex: Sunlit Artistic Escape in Gorna
description: Step into this bright and airy 3-bedroom duplex, where artistry meets sustainable living. Expansive living spaces are flooded with natural light—ideal for creating, relaxing, and entertaining. Upstairs, the master suite boasts a private ensuite bathroom; downstairs, a flexible open-plan studio area awaits your next project. Smart upgrades, including solar panels and an EV charging station, ensure comfort melds seamlessly with modern eco-conscious values.
neighborhood_description: Set in Gorna, Łódź’s dynamic heartland of innovation and creativity, this neighborhood hums with a unique rhythm. Studios, quirky cafés, and pet-friendly parks mingle beneath an easy canopy of tree-lined avenues. Friendly public green spaces and bike lanes define the local culture, blending peaceful suburbia with an undercurrent of inspiration.
lifestyle_benefits: abundant natural lighting for creative work
reduced utility costs with solar energy
target_buyer: Ideal for artists, designers, or entrepreneurial spirits seeking inspiration, peace, and contemporary comforts without abandoning city access.
market_positioning: Positioned as a Boutique, Eco-friendly Duplex for Creatives craving ambiance and efficiency, nestled in one of Łódź's most up-and-coming districts.
